content.text: Hi I'm [user 1 name] nice to meet you!
Hi I'm [user 2 name] nice to meet you too! What are you up to today?
Not much just hanging out. I'm going to be a business major in college. What about you?
I just graduated high school with honors! I'm trying to decide what I want to do. I'm really passionate about photography and my father is a great mentor.
That's awesome! I wish I was passionate about something. I have a very good memory.
That's a great skill! You can always be a lawyer or something.
I'm not sure if I'm cut out for that. I'm thinking of being a doctor. My spouse is a doctor and they work long hours, but they always make time for me and our dog.
That's a great career path! I love animals but I'm not sure if I'm cut out for vet school. I love biking and I live in my parent's basement while I save up for an apartment.
That's awesome! I'm not really into sports but I like to play video games. I'm a huge fan of One Direction.
I love One Direction too! My favorite song is What Makes You Beautiful.
Mine too! I'm also a big fan of their new song, History.
Their new song is great! I love the music video.
I'm so glad we met! I think we're going to be friends.
I think so too! I'm glad I met you too
